TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_planks
inventory=[{"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "structure_block", "quantity": 22, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 13, "index": 23}, {"type": "music_disc_ward", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "target", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 51, "index": 26}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "magma_cube_spawn_egg", "quantity": 33, "index": 29}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 30, "index": 35}, {"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft warped_planks, I need to place the warped_hyphae in slot 28 into the crafting table. I will place it in slot 1.
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_planks
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "structure_block", "quantity": 22, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 13, "index": 23}, {"type": "music_disc_ward", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "target", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 51, "index": 26}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "magma_cube_spawn_egg", "quantity": 33, "index": 29}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 30, "index": 35}, {"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}]
thought: I can now craft the warped_planks. I will move them from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4
